<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_481</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_481</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Ecuaciones, sistemas e inecuaciones</string>
            <string language="en">Simultaneus equations and inequations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Simultaneus Gleichungen und inequations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Équations et inequations de Simultaneus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Equações e inequations de Simultaneus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Equazioni ed inequations di Simultaneus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξισώσεις και inequations Simultaneus</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones la resolución de ecuaciones, sistemas e inecuaciones. Se estudian ecuaciones de primer y segundo grado, sistemas de primer grado y grado superior, ecuaciones irracionales e inecuaciones.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to solve equations, systems and inequalities. It studies first and second degree equations, systems of linear equations and higher order equations, irrational equations and inequalities.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">álgebra</string>
            <string language="en">algebra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">ecuación</string>
            <string language="en">equation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">inecuación</string>
            <string language="en">inequality</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">sistema</string>
            <string language="en">system</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">irracional</string>
            <string language="en">irrational</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, Gleichungen, Systeme und Verschiedenheiten zu lösen. 
Sie studiert zuerst und zweite Gradgleichungen, Systeme der 
linearen Gleichungen und der höhere Ordnung Gleichungen, der 
vernunftwidrigen Gleichungen und der Verschiedenheiten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations de résoudre des équations, des systèmes et des 
inégalités. Elle étudie d'abord et les deuxièmes équations 
de degré, systèmes des équations linéaires et des équations 
d'ordre plus supérieur, des équations irrationnelles et des 
inégalités.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações resolver 
equações, sistemas e desigualdades. Estuda primeiramente e as 
segundas equações do grau, sistemas de equações lineares e de 
equações de uma ordem mais elevada, de equações irrational e de 
desigualdades.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
risolvere le equazioni, i sistemi e le diseguaglianze. Studia in
primo luogo e seconde equazioni di grado, sistemi delle equazioni 
lineari e delle equazioni di più alto ordine, delle equazioni 
irrazionali e delle diseguaglianze.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να λύσει τις εξισώσεις, τα συστήματα και τις ανισότητες. 
Μελετά πρώτα και εξισώσεις δεύτερου βαθμού, συστήματα των 
γραμμικών εξισώσεων και υψηλότερες εξισώσεις κατάταξης, των 
παράλογων εξισώσεων και των ανισοτήτων.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Algebra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gleichung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verschiedenheit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">System</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">vernunftwidrig</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">algèbre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">équation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">inégalité</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">système</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">irrationnel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">álgebra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sistema</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
